paragraph.pdf_unicode: • PROCEDURE Buffer solution: 2.7 g/L of monobasic potassium phosphate, adjusted with dilute phosphoric acid to a pH of 4.0 Solution A: 5.4 g/L of monobasic potassium phosphate, adjusted with dilute phosphoric acid to a pH of 4.0 Solution B: Acetonitrile Mobile phase: See Table 1.

paragraph.input: <style id='1'>Standard solution: </style><style id='3'>0.7 mg/mL of </style><style id='5'>USP Sulbactam RS</style><style id='7'> prepared as follows. Dissolve a suitable amount of </style><style id='9'>USP Sulbactam RS</style><style id='11'> in </style><style id='13'>acetonitrile</style><style id='15'>, using 2% of the �nal volume, and dilute with </style><style id='17'>Buffer solution</style><style id='19'> to volume.</style>
paragraph.output: <style id='1'>标准溶液： </style><style id='3'>0.7 mg/mL的 </style><style id='5'>USP舒巴坦RS</style><style id='7'> 准备如下。溶解适量的 </style><style id='9'>USP舒巴坦RS</style><style id='11'> 于 </style><style id='13'>乙腈</style><style id='15'> 中，占总最终体积的2%，然后用 </style><style id='17'>缓冲溶液</style><style id='19'> 稀释至刻度。</style>
paragraph.pdf_unicode: Standard solution: 0.7 mg/mL of USP Sulbactam RS prepared as follows. Dissolve a suitable amount of USP Sulbactam RS in acetonitrile, using 2% of the �nal volume, and dilute with Buffer solution to volume.

paragraph.output:
稀释剂：用缓冲溶液稀释2 mL的乙腈至100 mL
系统适用性溶液：每种0.7 μg/mL的USP舒巴坦相关化合物A RS、USP舒巴坦相关化合物D RS、USP舒巴坦相关化合物E RS和USP舒巴坦相关化合物F RS，按以下方法配制。将适量的USP舒巴坦相关化合物A RS、USP舒巴坦相关化合物D RS、USP舒巴坦相关化合物E RS和USP舒巴坦相关化合物F RS溶解在乙腈中，使用最终体积的10%，根据需要超声处理。用稀释剂稀释至体积。保护此溶液免受光照。
标准储备溶液：每毫升含0.7 mg的USP舒巴坦RS，按以下方法配制。将适量USP舒巴坦RS溶解在乙腈中，使用最终体积的2%，然后用缓冲溶液稀释至体积。
标准溶液：每毫升含0.7 μg的USP舒巴坦RS，由标准储备溶液用稀释剂配制。
系统适用性样品：系统适用性溶液和标准溶液
适用性要求
分离度：系统适用性溶液中，舒巴坦相关化合物D与舒巴坦相关化合物E之间的分离度不低于1.5

paragraph.output: {v1}<style id='2'>B</style><style id='4'>ACTERIAL</style><style id='6'> E</style><style id='8'>NDOTOXINS</style><style id='10'> T</style><style id='12'>EST</style><style id='14'> </style><style id='16'>〈</style><style id='18'>85</style><style id='20'>〉</style><style id='22'>: </style><style id='24'>当标签标明磺巴坦钠为无菌的或需在注射剂型制备过程中进一步加工时，其细菌内毒素水平应符合使用磺巴坦钠的相关剂型专论的要求。</style><style id='26'>▲</style><style id='28'>▲</style> (美国药典 2023年12月1日)
paragraph.pdf_unicode: • BACTERIAL ENDOTOXINS TEST 〈85〉: Where the label states that Sulbactam Sodium is sterile or must be subjected to further processing during the ▲ preparation of injectable dosage forms, the level of bacterial endotoxins is such that the requirement under the relevant dosage form monograph(s) in which Sulbactam Sodium is used can be met.▲ (USP 1-Dec-2023)
